import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../App.css"; import "./Contact.css"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer/Footer"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Contact() { const [data, setData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "", }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { const newData = {...data} newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value setData(newData) console.l axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/send-mail", data) .then((res) => { console.log(res.mailData); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>

{t("lets_connect")}

{t("adress_below")} :

+228 ( 91 85 12 80 / 99 51 32 40 )

handleSubmit(e)} value={data.name} />
handleSubmit(e)} value={data.email} />
handleSubmit(e)} value={data.phone} />
